2024-03-01
/* Language: Flix Category: functional Author: Magnus Madsen Website: https://flix.dev/ */ /** @type LanguageFn */ function flix(hljs) { const CHAR = { className: 'string', begin: /'(.|\\[xXuU][a-zA-Z0-9]+)'/ }; const STRING = { className: 'string', variants: [ { begin: '"', end: '"' } ] }; const NAME = { className: 'title', relevance: 0, begin: /[^0-9\n\t "'(),.`{}\[\]:;][^\n\t "'(),.`{}\[\]:;]+|[^0-9\n\t "'(),.`{}\[\]:;=]/ }; const METHOD = { className: 'function', beginKeywords: 'def', end: /[:={\[(\n;]/, excludeEnd: true, contains: [ NAME ] }; return { name: 'Flix', keywords: { keyword: [ "case", "class", "def", "else", "enum", "if", "impl", "import", "in", "lat", "rel", "index", "let", "match", "namespace", "switch", "type", "yield", "with" ], literal: [ "true", "false" ] }, contains: [ hljs.C_LINE_COMMENT_MODE, hljs.C_BLOCK_COMMENT_MODE, CHAR, STRING, METHOD, hljs.C_NUMBER_MODE ] }; } export { flix as default };
